item.description: Sorry for the short notice, but it's supposed to be nice this Saturday. How about a quick hop to somewhere besides I-hop? The earlier the better for me, but the usual 8:30 works. Any takers?
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one wearing a scuba diver's helmet and pink bunny slippers (only)

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Breakfast run to somewhere? Southbridge?
